text: (visvasavantayinta) ovun “oba yudevvan nætahot kristiyanuvan bavata pat vanu. (evita oba) rju margaya at kara ganu labannehuya” yayi pavasannaha. (eyata) “ese nova, rju margayata ayat ibrahimge dharmayama (anugamanaya karannemu). ohu (oba men) samanayan taba næmadu ayeku nova” yayi (pavasana men visvasavantayinta nabiye!) oba pavasanu (mænava)
